title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: English Simulation for Enhancing Global Scientific News Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and secondary-level English reading proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more types of science news (articles, videos, infographics) in a VR environment and extract key information with 80% accuracy.
Learners can collaboratively present science issue solutions in English for 10+ minutes through simulation-based role-play with peers.
Learners develop a habit of voluntarily exploring international science news sources at least three times weekly for two weeks after the course.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
